reviews.review_text: The rug was wonderful however it wasn't quite the color I was looking for, and the size was a little smaller than it appeared. Then it said it would be the quality was wonderful. Hello the quality was good. The creases fell out after a few days and the vacuuming was fine. Would purchase again from the seller thank you very much.

reviews.title: So Soft and Cozy!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this rug! It's incredibly soft, adds a cozy touch to my living room, and looks just like the picture. Great quality for the price. I would definitely buy again in another color!

reviews.title: Perfect Purchase
reviews.review_text: Just got it today. Shipment time was fast. it's perfect... really cute! It's so soft and fluffy, and the Black color is nice and dark. I love how it feels. it fits perfectly under my small dining room set. I have the 3X5 for size reference.
I wouldn't recommend vacuum in it. You would just need to take it and sweep it and dust it out and I wish it was a little heavier, but I'm going to buy me more but in a bigger size.

reviews.title: Beautiful black rug, worth the buy!!!
reviews.review_text: I 100% love it! I'm glad I purchased this! It goes well with black accents in my room. The only downfall is its slippery... so be careful running barefoot across it.
A good value for a soft shaggy rug. Nice and warm on a cold floor. Very lightweight. I would recommend affixing the rug with some rug tape because it is so light. Suitable for any room.

Have you ever heard you get what you pay for? I received the rug in a vacuum packed bag. The rug has been laying flat for over a week and still has folds in it. Very cheap again you get what you pay for.

reviews.title: Fraud Rug
reviews.review_text: This rug is not even the rug that's posted online the color is different. The shag is different. It is an imposter of what is advertised. I would strongly consider Walmart not do business with this third-party. Do not order this rug. This company is a fraud.

reviews.title: DON'T buy!!!
reviews.review_text: Way too slick. I've never seen a rug that is this slick. Walked on it one time, fell and suffered injuries including a broken arm. Returning as defective

it is awful.. you can not shake anything out of it.. every single thing sticks in it and it's impossible to get stuff off of it... you for sure can't vacuum it either...i threw it in the garbage...i didn't even waist my time to take it back to Walmart.

i DON'T WEAR SHOES IN THE HOUSE! BUT WE HAVE WOOD FLOORS IN THE LIVING ROOM AND IT'S ALWAYS COLD! SO, WHEN I'M SITTING AT MY DESK, MY FEET GET COLD! I LOVE THIS SOFT FLUFFY RUG UNDER MY FEET! EASY TO VACUUM AND IT'S PRETTY TOO! THE COLOR IS REALLY VIBRANT AND I LOVE HOW IT FEELS UNDER MY BARE FEET!

I'm so happy with this rug! I got the hot pink one. The color is good, the fluffy texture is really nice, and it's even got a little padding, so it's soft to step on. I've washed it once so far on delicates in the washer, and it turned out fine--I didn't put it in the dryer.

reviews.title: Smell is strong
reviews.review_text: Its a soft and big rug but the odd smell is overwhelming.

reviews.title: Yuk!
reviews.review_text: These rugs are awful! I wish I had not ordered them! They feel weird on my feet.
I love the colo, goes great with the decor. The size fits perfectly for my daughter's limited space. I was surprised at how soft it is

reviews.title: Arogan Super Soft, Fluffy Area Rug
reviews.review_text: The color is know, and fluffy
vacuum was tough but it just right in the washer for deep cleaning

reviews.title: Well Worth It
reviews.review_text: it came in a cery small package, which is nice and it lays very nicely after it lays out for a bit. Got it on clearance, so it's worth it!
Beautiful bright red fuzzy rug. Just the right size and color. Love it~!!

reviews.title: A WASTE OF MONEY
reviews.review_text: MATERIAL AWFUL ITS SLICK,%26 SLIPPERY LIKE CHEAP ANIMAL SKIN .UGH
The only thing I didn't like about it is it's too small.

reviews.title: Comfy and cozy
reviews.review_text: It is very soft feels your walking on a cloud. Very manageable and recommended anyone getting it.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: Color was exactly like the picture and the rug is VERY soft and great quality!

reviews.title: Great luxury rugs
reviews.review_text: Beautiful soft silky plush elegant

reviews.title: Aqua love on your floor
reviews.review_text: Soft, good size and beautiful. Great price.

reviews.title: oretty color and feel
reviews.review_text: i like the color purple and texture. i just hope it fits under my bed.

reviews.title: Great gift
reviews.review_text: I like it very much it was a gift for my great great granddaughter and she loved it

reviews.title: Awesome !!!
reviews.review_text: Beautiful it's bigger then I thought but it's lovely in my bathroom

reviews.title: Very Nice
reviews.review_text: I love this rug. It's exactly how it's described. Just wish I would have gotten it longer, but it still looks nice.

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.review_text: This rug is as pictured and it feels very soft the blue I choose is very vibrant this is definitely a yes

reviews.title: very light andceoft, corners a lil funky...
reviews.review_text: the corners are a lil funky, but not too noticeable... its very lightweight and soft, but looks good...

reviews.title: poor quality not worth buying
reviews.review_text: not the best quality, falls advertisement, not what I expected, i don't suggest no one buy this cheap quality carpet, so called carpet.

reviews.title: Good with a rug pad.
reviews.review_text: Its silky smooth, and a nice color. It does NOT shed. Hard to vaccuum because of its hair length. It's not thick at all. I bought a rug pad for it, so the total came to about $85. Most nice rugs are over $110, you get what you pay for. Get a nice rug pad and you get $85 of quality. Came vacuum sealed so you need to let it decompress for a couple days.

reviews.title: Pretty Fury Carpets
reviews.review_text: They are thinly made. Great caroet after you wait for it to expand, the size us legit, the color is true to its description as well but the carpet has no kind of cushion its thin. If your looking for just a beautiful carpet to display items or just accent your room this will be great for you.

i am not understanding why people are leaving reviews saying this rug is super thin.its nicely padded and of a nice thickness.vert soft and fluffy and the perfect size for what i needed.3 hours after ooening it,it is completely smoothed out and all creases are gone from the effect of being vacuum packed.really not a baf deal for the price

reviews.title: I Do Not Recommend Purchasing!! SEE PICS
reviews.review_text: I was pleased when I first opened this package. But after 4 months and for the price I paid, this rug is DONE!! It's matted in middle area already! I am not happy with this rug at all. I WISH I could get a refund for it!! I will never purchase again. See my pictures. The first picture is how it looks brand new. It's a side picture of where I have a chair sitting. But look at last two pics. I purchased this rug March 24,2024 and today is July 12,2024. I've had extremely better area rugs that lasted for years still holding up great. I do not recommend this product.

The rug looks and feels wonderful. however, I washed it when I received it due to the stuffy smell. After washing the foam in the rug, was completely off. I attempted to fix it with no avail. I still used it. The back of the rub is like that of a regular rug for your bathroom. I can't vacuum the rug because of how soft the back of the rug is. It doesn't have any grip or firmness to it like your typical area rug have.

reviews.title: Fabulous but Smaller than expected
reviews.review_text: These chairs are beautiful and soft. They are easy to put together. All you have to do is put the legs on. I bought these for the reading area of my classroom and they are perfect for middle schoolers. The color royal blue is little greener than I expected. They are a lot smaller than I expected. Overall an amazing purchase.

reviews.title: Area rug
reviews.review_text: Not what I expected. It's too furry for my taste, and it hard to keep clean and dust free.

reviews.title: Soft
reviews.review_text: Nice soft rug, I have it beside the bed so it's the first thing I step on in the morning

reviews.title: LOVE
reviews.review_text: I love this rug so much I'm getting another. It's so soft and a has memory foam like feel.
It was everything I asked for ! The feeling is amazing. The color I ordered was correct as well.
It was an impulse buy but does the job for now. Came as expected I'm pleased with purchase
Not even the size or what it looks like in the pictures. Will be returning.
well, its not really all that good. its very soft. its thin and cheap.
I know the pictures says 2x3 but the carpet shouldn't be that big on the picture . It's false advertisement. They should put the actual size of the carpet on the picture .

reviews.title: Nonslip super comf
reviews.review_text: "I'm really happy w this rug. It grips well and my feet always love touching it. The vacuum works well on it and if you like to journey and space out on psychedelics, you want one of these. It's the perfect length for my queen size bed."

reviews.title: Shocked how nice!
reviews.review_text: It came in the tiniest package so my hopes weren't high, but once I opened it this rug is so nice for the price! It has grip on the bottom, a little cushion and the fur is so soft and doesn't get everywhere! So pleased!

reviews.title: expected better
reviews.review_text: size is great but it's far from "fluffy". another smoke and mirrors item. i don't have the time to go through the half of returns, that why i order delivery.
I adore these rugs!! I bought 2 in of them…….one on each side of my bed. I liked them so much I went back %26 bought another for my living room. Just as it looks in the ad %26 true to size.

reviews.title: Delivery
reviews.review_text: I ordered 5 things. they are all being delivered separately. So which delivery Person will receive The tip? and a charge for the 5 sacks!!! it is all adding up, people. are we really saving anything?
I bought two of them for my bedroom. They're almost paper thin, and does not look like the picture at all. I mean they're OK for what I want them but I wanted something a little bit thicker.

reviews.title: Slippery and cheap
reviews.review_text: Feels more like a weird thin blanket. The "shaggy" top has a synthetic in plastic feel, so it's slippery if you walk on it with socks. The bottom anti-slip part doesn't work - still slides easily on a wood floor. Would not recommend at all.

reviews.title: Amazing just hard to vacuum
reviews.review_text: Overall love. Can't really vacuum so have to take everything off of it to take it outside and shake it out. Or pin down the corners and vacuum on bare floor setting because the pile gets stuck in the brush roller and errors my vacuum.

reviews.title: Strange feel
reviews.review_text: Doesn't feel like a rug. “Fur” is very soft %26 silky, but almost slippery. The grippers on the bottom hold the rug in place, but actually stepping on rug seems slick.

reviews.title: perf3ct rug for little ones
reviews.review_text: Perfect rug for my 2.5 year old niece! she absolutely loves laying and playing on this rug. it is extremely soft and does not shed. Easy to vacuum too.

reviews.title: Soft and Fluffy Rug
reviews.review_text: Bought for my son's dorm. it is super soft and fluffy. Way better than walking around on cold tile floors!

reviews.title: Rug
reviews.review_text: I thought this was going to be like a regular rug. when I got it it was vacuumed sealed in a little package. It's not worth what I paid for it.

reviews.title: Best Rugs Ever!
reviews.review_text: I bought 3 of these rugs, they are fabulous! So super soft, wash up perfectly, come out of the dryer so fluffy. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.title: Comfort
reviews.review_text: Very soft to the touch and makes it feels like comfort under your bare feet. The only draw back is that I wish it was a little more thicker
It's so soft, it does come vacuum sealed but it fluffs up quick and the creases go away in about 48 hours

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Very slippery to walk on, would not recommend for older people, I gave it away to someone for their dog to sleep on. Not fluffy as shown in picture.

reviews.title: awful
reviews.review_text: smells of chemicals..had to wash several times..not as soft and fuzzy..lost a lot of fibers in the wash

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: I was very satisfied product was very nice and ex actually good or better than expected good. Quality

reviews.title: Dissatisfied
reviews.review_text: This has no purple to it. Dark gray. (Very thin). Also it comes shrink wrapped and I can't get the creases and "bubbles " out of it.

reviews.title: fluffy
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas she told her mom she wanted a black fluffy rug for her room I think she will love it, I do.

reviews.title: Love it, minus one flaw.
reviews.review_text: Love the size, color, and feel of this rug...just wishing it was actually non slip. I'd still recommend.

reviews.title: No bad
reviews.review_text: In the advertisement it looks better than it really is more it is usable.
I like the softness of the rug it feels nice to walk or stand on with bare feet.
granddaughter loved this. She wanted fluffy and a little shaggy
Looks good and feels fluffy but very slippery and dangerous for someone with difficulty walking.
I like the size for the price it was excellent with the fitting of my boys room
My son loves it he says it's so soft I got it for his college dorm

reviews.title: It feels fabulous
reviews.review_text: The rug is soft, fluffy. zeveryone who feels it, says its soft enough to sleep on.

reviews.title: It's perfect and very soft and great material
reviews.review_text: Was very surprised on the high quality of the rug and very soft
I love how soft the rug is. I got the 6x9 and it was the perfect size for my entire living room.

reviews.title: Soooo soft and comfy.

reviews.review_text: I bought it for my son's room, perfect size, he loved it!

reviews.review_text: Got this for my daughters play area, its super soft and plushy perfect for a clumsy child
It's better than the picture and bigger than I thought it was going to be

reviews.title: Too thin
reviews.review_text: More of a royal blue and doesn't grip floor enough.

reviews.title: so fluffy
reviews.review_text: the thicker cushiony pad makes the faux fur feel even fluffier. absolutely in love!
Love this rug. Bought another one for my other grandson. They really like them.

reviews.title: NICE RUG
reviews.review_text: Nice fluffy rug,,, it's a little to big where I got it at but I like the feel of it barefoot.😇
so then you can see the rug base in between the shag

reviews.title: area rùg
reviews.review_text: absolutely love this rug nothing negative to szy about it it is very soft and fluffy.

reviews.title: beautiful area rug
reviews.review_text: very nice color. lilac.... so soft, great price for the size

reviews.title: not what i expected
reviews.review_text: This very thin and cheaply made.

reviews.title: White fluffy area rug.
reviews.review_text: Awesome rug for the price! Looks great and decent quality!

reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase!
reviews.review_text: I love the size, plushness if this rug

reviews.title: Perfect Buy
reviews.review_text: I like that it fits perfectly right in front of my son's bed. And makes his room look very cozy. I actually bought two. And I'm glad I did! They are very soft and it feels like I'm walking on carpet in his room, we have hardwood floors. He has one in front and on the other side.

reviews.title: Great quality and super soft!
reviews.review_text: Was nervous to purchase a rug without actually feeling it first, but I'm so glad I did. This rug is SO soft! It's big, and the color is exactly like the picture (pink). Got it for my daughters room and it's hands down the best rug I've purchased online. It's not paper thin either, it's got a nice thick backing but not thick enough to have a tough time rolling it up. Love it so much I ended up buying a grey one for my sons room too. 100 % recommended!

reviews.title: So soft
reviews.review_text: This rug is the softest rug ever! I haven't tried to vacuum it yet so I can't speak to that. However, our puppy has peed on it while potty training and it cleans up easily with no smell. It is kind of slippery but as long as it's under a piece of furniture I feel safe that I won't slip.

reviews.title: Incredibly soft
reviews.review_text: I bought this rug to replace the old one my Sheltie puppy destroyed for my daughters room (4yo). The rug cane very quickly despite the current pandemic in a vacuum sealed bag. Once opened, I found out that this rug is probably one of the softest to the touch things I've ever handled. It's a nice color pink and it looks great under her loft bed. Obviously I received it only recently and haven't had the need to clean it but I can always change my review. Would recommend!

reviews.title: Thin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't seem like it'll last too long it's soft and fuzzy but the bottom is thin

reviews.title: Non slip soft
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS RUG! IT'S SUUUUPER DUPER SOFT AND VERY AFFORDABLE! AWESOME COLOR AND GREAT NON SLIP. I MEAN IT DOES NOT SLIP AT ALL!!!! I ORDERED TWO 5.3 X 4 IN ORDER TO COVER THE AREA AND THEY EMARE PERFECT AND NON SLIP!

reviews.title: Non slip soft
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS RUG! IT'S SUUUUPER DUPER SOFT AND VERY AFFORDABLE! AWESOME COLOR AND GREAT NON SLIP. I MEAN IT DOES NOT SLIP AT ALL!!!! I ORDERED TWO 4 X 5.3 IN ORDER TO COVER THE AREA AND THEY EMARE PERFECT AND NON SLIP!

reviews.title: So cute!!
reviews.review_text: This rug is so pretty! So soft too. Says it takes 2-3 days to fully be fluffed up but I still like how it looks upon just opening it!! Love it, highly recommend so far.

I was disappointed. It is very soft but, it's very thin and slippery. I wouldn't recommend it for people up in age or people with high risk falls. I had to pick mine up because I was concerned for my 79 year mother.

reviews.title: So nice and soft!
reviews.review_text: Bought rug for my living. It is nice and soft. I like the padding it has to it. Would definitely buy again!
This rug is so soft and comfortable. Will order more in different colors.

reviews.title: Gifts!
reviews.review_text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter, it fits perfectly in her room, she often plays on it

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.review_text: I love it!! Very soft and clean just what I want it! Thanks!

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.review_text: I am very happy with that rug. It is very soft and good size. My daughter loves it!

reviews.title: My students love this rug!
reviews.review_text: It is so soft and easy to clean. The Students love to lay on it.

reviews.title: Great rugs!!
reviews.review_text: I love these rugs, I bought 3 so far. They are so soft and comfy and wash up and dry beautifully!
